paragraphs.text: According to scientists, for as long as there have been intoxicants, a portion of human beings has struggled with addiction
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: For millennia, various disciplines including medicine, psychiatry and religion attempted, unsuccessfully, to help people suffering from an addiction to booze
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All of the approaches stemmed from the same common approach
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Let's resolve your problems so you'll stop drinking
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Alcoholics Anonymous reversed this
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: A.A  has succeeded because it was the first to say,"Stop drinking FIRST and then we'll work on your problems."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Thanks to this subtle shift, countless jobs, marriages, and even lives have been saved
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Heretofore, humanity's approach to peace has been like outdated approaches to alcoholism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Attempts at peace have centered on,"Let's resolve our differences so we can stop killing each other."
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This has only lead to the discovery of more differences and more killing
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It's time we followed the example of recovery programs such as A.A  and resolve to, FIRST, stop killing each other and then we can work on our differences
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: War is used as a tool of international policy because people accept it
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: All we have to do is change our minds-- to cease to believe that war is an acceptable necessary evil and to begin to believe that no disagreement is worth killing each other's children
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Countries have been trying to resolve their differences so that there will no longer be war
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: We need to declare peace first and then spend eternity working out our differences
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The option of war is simply removed from the table
paragraphs.label: assumption
